// Left Triangle Star Pattern

package Assignment;

public class starPattern1 {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int i, j;
		for (i = 1; i <= 5; i++) {
			for (j = 1; j <= i; j++) {
				System.out.print("*");
			}
			System.out.println(" ");
		}

	}

}




//pyramid pattern

package Assinment;

public class pyramidPattern {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
int i,j;
for(i=1;i<=4;i++) {
	for(j=1;j<=i;j++){
		System.out.print("* ");
		
		
	}
	System.out.println(" ");
}
	}

}







//upside down pattern
package Assignment;

public class upsideDownPattern {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int i,j;
        for(i=1;i<=6;i++) {
        	for(j=6;j>=i;j--) {
        		
        		System.out.print("*");
        	}
        	System.out.println(" ");
        }
	}

}







//Write a program to print 10 to 1 using while loop

package assinment;

public class while {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int i=10,n=0;
		while(i>n) {
			
			System.out.println(i);
			i--;
		}
	}

}





//WAP to print numbers divisible by 3 from 1 to 100

package assignment;

public class divisible {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
     int i=1;
      while( i<=100) {
    	  
    	  if(i%3==0) {
    	  
    		  System.out.println(i);}
    		  i++;
      }
      } 
      }
